detail.description: Century Plyboards India Ltd was incorporated in January 1982 by Mr. Sajjan Bhajanka and Mr. Sanjay Agarwal. The company has a diversified portfolio & manufactures plywood, veneer, laminates, medium density fibre (MDF), particle board and allied products. [1]
